QualityMeasureDocument.title: Hepatitis C: Hepatitis A Vaccination in Patients with HCV
QualityMeasureDocument.text: Percentage of patients aged 18 years and older with a diagnosis of hepatitis C who have received at least one injection of hepatitis A vaccine, or who have documented immunity to hepatitis A

representedOrganization.name: American Medical Association - Physician Consortium for Performance Improvement
American Medical Association - Physician Consortium for Performance Improvement

measureAttribute.value: © 2010 American Medical Association. All Rights Reserved

Assure that hepatitis A vaccination is received except for cases of documented medical reasons. This vaccination decreases the potential for a patient acquiring hepatitis A which would contribute to further liver damage.

All patients with chronic hepatitis C should be vaccinated against hepatitis A, and seronegative persons with risk factors for hepatitis B virus (HBV) should be vaccinated against hepatitis B. (NIH, 2002). Person in whom the diagnosis of hepatitis C is established are candidates for hepatitis A and hepatitis B vaccines. (AGA, 2006).
National Institutes of Health (NIH). Management of hepatitis C: 2002. Rockville (MD): National Institutes of Health (NIH); 2002 Aug 26.
Dienstag JL, McHutchinson JG. American Gastroenterological Association (AGA) medical position statement on the management of hepatitis C. Gastroenterology. 2006 Jan; 130 (1): 225-30.
Received: Includes documentation that a patient received at least one injection of hepatitis A vaccine from another provider

Initial Patient Population(s): Patients aged 18 years and older at the beginning of the measurement period.
Diagnosis Active: Patient has a documented diagnosis of Hepatitis C.
Encounter: At least 2 visits with the physician, physician's assistant, or nurse practitioner during the measurement period.
Denominator(s): All patients aged 18 years and older with a diagnosis of Hepatitis C.
Numerator(s): Patients who have received at least one injection of Hepatitis A vaccine, or who have documented immunity to Hepatitis A.

Denominator Exception(s): Documentation of medical reason(s) for not administering at least one injection of Hepatitis A vaccine.
Documentation of patient reason(s) for not administering at least one injection of Hepatitis A vaccine.

Report "Patient Characteristic: Gender" using "Gender HL7 Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.1)"; Report "Patient Characteristic: Race" using "Race CDC Value Set (2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.836)"; Report "Patient Characteristic: Ethnicity" using "Ethnicity CDC Value Set (2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.837)"; Report "Patient Characteristic: Payer" using "Payer Source of Payment Typology Value Set (2.16.840.1.113883.3.221.5)".

list.item: AND: "Patient Characteristic: birth date" >= 18 year(s) starts before start of "Measurement period"

AND:
OR: "Diagnosis, Active: Chronic Hepatitis C"
OR: "Diagnosis, Active: Acute Hepatitis C"
OR: "Diagnosis, Active: Unspecified Hepatitis C"
starts before or during ("Encounter: Encounter Office & Outpatient Consult" during "Measurement period")
AND: Count >= 2 of:"Encounter: Encounter Office & Outpatient Consult" during "Measurement period"
AND: "Initial Patient Population"
None

AND: Count >= 1 of:
OR: "Procedure, Performed: Hepatitis A Vaccination"
OR: "Medication, Administered: Hepatitis A Vaccine"
starts before or during "Measurement period"

AND:
OR: "Laboratory Test, Result: HAV Antibody Test (result: 'positive')"
OR: "Laboratory Test, Result: IgM anti-HAV Test (result: 'negative')"
OR: "Laboratory Test, Result: IgG anti-HAV Test (result: 'positive')"
starts before or during "Measurement period"

AND:
OR:
OR: "Procedure, Performed not done: Medical reason" for "Hepatitis A Vaccination Value Set GROUPING"
OR: "Procedure, Performed not done: Patient reason" for "Hepatitis A Vaccination Value Set GROUPING"
OR: "Procedure, Performed not done: Medical Reason Vaccine Not Given" for "Hepatitis A Vaccination Value Set GROUPING"
OR: "Procedure, Performed not done: Patient Reason Vaccine Not Given" for "Hepatitis A Vaccination Value Set GROUPING"
during "Measurement period"
OR:
OR: "Medication, Administered not done: Medical reason" for "Hepatitis A Vaccine RxNorm Value Set"
OR: "Medication, Administered not done: Patient reason" for "Hepatitis A Vaccine RxNorm Value Set"
OR: "Medication, Administered not done: Medical Reason Vaccine Not Given" for "Hepatitis A Vaccine RxNorm Value Set"
OR: "Medication, Administered not done: Patient Reason Vaccine Not Given" for "Hepatitis A Vaccine RxNorm Value Set"
during "Measurement period"
OR:
OR: "Medication, Allergy: Hepatitis A Vaccine"
OR: "Medication, Intolerance: Hepatitis A Vaccine"
OR: "Medication, Adverse Effects: Hepatitis A Vaccine"
starts before or during ("Encounter: Encounter Office & Outpatient Consult" during "Measurement period")
